channel.title: About on pokyah - opensource science, GIS and data-analysis

item.title: Meta
item.description: Why this website ? A website is highly useful for yourself to keep track of what you have done and thought. Sometimes you may go back to a certain old post of yours to relearn the tricks or methods you once mastered in the past but have forgotten. How is it built ? This website is built with R blogdown which uses a combination of Hugo, Rmarkdown and knitr.
